title: Embroidered Picture, "Rebecca and Eliezer", 17th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Unfinished picture embroidered in colored silks on a linen ground. Design suggested by a print by Gerard de Jode after Martin de Vos, "Eliezer and Rebeka."

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, "Rebecca and Eliezer", 17th century.
17th century. Medium: linen, silk
Technique: embroidered. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-52-10.
